#include <stdio.h>
#include <string.h>
int main(){
    int t;
    char dummy[2];
    scanf("%d",&t);
    gets(dummy);
    while(t--){
               char a[128];
               gets(a);
               int j=0;
               for(int i=0;i<strlen(a);i++){
                       if(i==0){
                                if(a[i]=='8'&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0'))printf("ate");
                                else if(a[i]=='4'&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0'))printf("for");
                                else if(a[i]=='w'&&a[i+1]=='8'&&(a[i+2]==' '||a[i+2]=='\0')){
                                     printf("wait");
                                     i++;
                                     }
                                else if(a[i]=='b'&&a[i+1]=='4'&&(a[i+2]==' '||a[i+2]=='\0')){
                                     printf("before");
                                     i++;
                                     }
                                else if(a[i]=='g'&&a[i+1]=='r'&&a[i+2]=='8'&&(a[i+3]==' '||a[i+3]=='\0')){
                                     printf("great");
                                     i+=2;
                                     }
                                else printf("%c",a[i]);
                               }
                       else{
                               if(a[i]=='8'&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0')&&a[i-1]==' '){
                                                        printf("ate");
                                                        }
                                else if(a[i]=='4'&&(a[i+1]==' '||a[i+1]=='\0')&&a[i-1]==' ')printf("for");
                                else if(a[i]=='w'&&a[i+1]=='8'&&a[i-1]&&(a[i+2]==' '||a[i+2]=='\0')){
                                     printf("wait");
                                     i++;
                                     }
                                else if(a[i]=='b'&&a[i-1]==' '&&a[i+1]=='4'&&(a[i+2]==' '||a[i+2]=='\0')){
                                     printf("before");
                                     i++;
                                     }
                                else if(a[i]=='g'&&a[i-1]==' '&&a[i+1]=='r'&&a[i+2]=='8'&&(a[i+3]==' '||a[i+3]=='\0')){
                                     printf("great");
                                     i+=2;
                                     }
                                else printf("%c",a[i]);
                                     }
                               
                        }printf("\n");
                       }               
               
    return 0;
    }
